title: Sheffield Wednesday closing in on signing of Joey Pelupessy
description: Sheffield Wednesday are closing in on the signing of Dutch midfielder Joey Pelupessy.
content: The 24-year-old was scheduled to undergo a medical on Wednesday evening and looks set to become new Wednesday boss Jos Luhukay's first signing for the club.Pelupessy is captain at his hometown Eredivisie club, Heracles Almelo and has made 119 appearances for them since arriving from FC Twente in 2014.The defensive midfielder will give Luhukay another option in midfield, where he has been without Sam Hutchinson, Kieran Lee and Barry Bannan.
